attributes.action: Bring back Wartime Food Rationing to ensure there is plenty of food for everyone
attributes.additional_details:
People are having to go without food and essentials when in reality there is plenty to go around. This is because of greed and unwarranted panic. Restore order and allow people to at least be able to survive self sufficiently at home with comfort.

There are huge queues at supermarkets, aisles are emptied almost as quickly as they are filled. This does not help when we are all meant to be 'socially distancing' ourselves.
attributes.background: Implement rationing - using books and stamps or perhaps a digital alternative. Allow families and individuals to purchase the necessary amount of food and essentials dependent on the number of individuals in their home.
